title: Hawaii calls
creator_credit: T.W. Cate and Cate and McGlone Films
brief_description: Provides a good historical background and shows the great variety of scenery, fine hotels and Polynesian hospitality, together with the spirit of “Aloha” which make the Hawaiian Islands an ideal place for a holiday. Includes the many activities available to the tourists on the different islands - sports, night life, or just lazing in the sun.
